availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: This Army was created on December 2, 1861. It existed as a standalone army until it was transferred back to the Department of the Cumberland on October 24, 1862. Commander(s): Don Carlos Buell.

bibl.p: Frank J. Welcher, The Union Army, 1861-1865: Organization and Operations, vol. 2, The Western Theatre (Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1993), 192-206. Gerald J. Prokopowicz, All for the Regiment: The Army of the Ohio, 1861-1862 (Chapel Hill: The University of North Carolina Press, 2014).
